#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<map> 
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
map<ll,vector<int> > mp;
int arr[10001];
int main(){
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
		long long a,b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		mp[a*b].push_back(i);
	}
	int i =1;
	map<ll,vector<int> >::reverse_iterator it;
	for(it=mp.rbegin();it!=mp.rend();++it){
		for(vector<int>::iterator it1 = (it->second).begin();it1!=(it->second).end();++it1){
			arr[i] = *it1;
			i++;
		}
	}
	int q;
	cin>>q;
	while(q--){
		int a;
		cin>>a;
		cout<<arr[a]<<endl;
	}
}
